resources.string: Keep track of Products and Materials. Create new products from you current Materials or purchase more. Sort them by Department to figure out your best items.
Start recording your sales to see how your business perform
Generate your sales report or check previous ones to see how your business is growing with Go Sales.
If marked, the app will allow you to sell products even when you don\'t have any more in the inventory.
If marked, the app will allow you to produce more products even when one or more of it\'s materials required are depleted.
If marked, the app won\'t be able to modify the settings, inventory or cancel sales without the administrator password. Disable this if only you operate the app.
This content is protected by the administrator. Please use the administrator password
Not enough in stock to sell
Use this when you buy this product from a provider and sell it to your customers
Mark this if the product cannot be stored and needs to be made every time you sell it
This change will not generate a purchase operation
Not enough materials to produce a product
Start by adding products using the button to your bottom right. All of your products will be listed here.
Materials are needed to create some products. You can add more materials here and then use the \'Recipe\' button in the product detail to create a recipe.
You can create departments to sort better your products. Use the \'Department\' button in the product detail to assign it to one.
When products or materials are in low numbers or depleted they will be listed here. Use this list to buy more and replenish your stocks.
No purchases found. Select the day with the calendar option in the menu to see past purchases.
No products to sell. Go to the \'Products\' section and create products to start selling.
Add the materials used to produce or sell this product. Depending on the product\'s configuration, the added materials will deplete when you sell it or produce it.
This product is purchased and re-sold
This product can be stored in the inventory after its purchased or made.
This product cannot be stored and it\'s made when sold
A product with the same name already exists
A material with the same name already exists
Can\'t produce this kind of product
The material already exists in the product\'s recipe
Set the material amount in the recipe for the product. Set it to 0 (zero) to delete it from the recipe.
If marked, most of the operations that affect inventories will not change their existences.
Changing the price could affect your sales report. We recommend you to apply this change once you have printed your sales report.
Not enough in stock to sell
Take a moment to discover the amazing stuff Go Sales can do to help your business grow.
Go Sales is a Point of Sale to keep record of your sales, your inventories and your expenses records.
In Go Sales you must create Products to sell them. Each product has it\'s own price and settings.
Your Products, as in real life, can be made of Materials. In Go Sales you can create Materials and use them in each Product\'s recipe.
Whenever you sell, your inventories will slowly deplete. Go Sales takes care of this automatically so you can focus in your reports.
Go Sales has 3 sections. In each section you will be able to do different stuff. To start selling you must create a new Product. Let\\\'s try it now.
Hello. If you ever need help you can always tap on the \'Help\' icon to see useful help for the current screen.
All of your Materials will be listed here. Tap on one to add it in the recipe of this Product
You can create a Material in this screen.
To get delete a Product of the ticket, long-tap the item.
Your Products are sorted by Department to find them faster.
When you add a Product, the Sale total will update.
When the Sale is complete, use the \"Apply\" button to complete it.
Departments are used to sort your Products.
You can see how many Products are stored within a Product.
You can change the name of a Department by taping it on the list.
You can always create new Departments.
Here you can perform your Sales.
In the Inventory, you can create Products and Materials, edit them and check their existences.
You can check your sales and expenses during the day.
You can check your Sales and Expenses of the day.
Here you can create Materials and edit them.
To sort your Products, you can create Departments.
When your Inventories are near to deplete you can check them here.
All of your Purchases Operations are saved here.
When your Inventories are near to deplete, they will be listed automatically here.
You can check the stock of each listed Product or Material.
If you wish, you can Buy here by taping the Product or Material you need to replenish.
You can export a file with all this information to print it or save it in the device.
These are the existences. With this button you can Buy more and generate a Purchase Order.
If you wish to manually adjust the stocks without generate a Purchase Order, use this button.
For security reasons, you must unblock the view before editing it.
All your Materials are shown here. Tap one to access it and edit it.
You can create Materials with the button.
This is the Product\'s stock. Use this button to Buy or Produce more of it.
Sale price. This is how much you charge for the Product.
Use this button to assign this Product to a Department.
You can use the Recipe button to confgue the required Materials to Produce or Sell this Product.
You can configure the Product to fit your business needs.
If you ever lose controll over your Inventory, you can edit their stocks without generating Purchase Operations.
For security reasons, the Product cannot be edited unless you tap on the \'Edit\' button. All changes will be saved automatically.
Add more Products with the \'Add\' button
To See or Edit a Product, tap it on the list.
When you re-stock your Inventories, a Purchase Order will be generated and will be listed here.
The Purchase Order specifies the quantity of purchased items.
